text: Patrice Thévenard (born 25 October 1954) is a former French racing cyclist. His sporting career began with ACBB Paris. He rode in three editions of the Tour de France between 1979 and 1984. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Seine-et-Marne Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Patrice Thévenard
